hadiths.text: Umm Salama reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:You bring to me, for (judgment) your disputes, some of you perhaps being more eloquent in their plea than others, so I give judgment on their behalf according to what I hear from them. (Bear in mind, in my judgment) if I slice off anything for him from the right of his brother, he should not accept that, for I sliced off for him a portion from the Hell

chapter.eng-name: So the judgement of the judge does not change what happened
